direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve loan transactions but perform opposite actions (borrowing vs. repaying).
Both methods handle loan repayment-related operations with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods perform loan repayments but differ in the type of loan (flexible vs. standard).
Both methods modify loan-related parameters and access similar resources.
Both methods handle loan-related operations and manage similar exceptions.

enhanced_by.reason: Loan borrowing must occur before repayment, affecting the state of the loan.
Repayment history should be updated after a repayment operation.
Repayment history can be used to verify the success of the repayment operation.
